article_node.title: DBI Investor News: If You Have Suffered Losses in Designer Brands Inc. (NYSE: DBI), You Are Encouraged to Contact The Rosen Law Firm About Your Rights - Designer Brands (NYSE:DBI)
article_node.summary: Rosen Law Firm is pursuing a securities class action against Designer Brands Inc. (DBI) following allegations that the company issued materially misleading information, which contributed to an 18.2% drop in its stock on June 10, 2025. Shareholders who purchased DBI securities may join the class and seek compensation on a contingency basis. The firm invites investors to submit a claim via its website or contact details provided in the release.
